issue.title: [CF 624] Debuff group for boss debuffs that require action
issue.body:
For example: CataBossDebuffs

Lightning Conductor
Consuming Flames
Explosive Cinders
Lightning Rod
Blackout
Engulfing Magic
Waterlogged
Wrack
Tormented
Torment
Searing Seeds
Burning Orb
Ice Lance
Fading Light
Twilight Barrage
Corrupting Parasite


> Posted by CurseForge user flibb | Imported from CurseForge issue #624 | Raw
